data.title: 2025 Best Christian Colleges in Arizona
data.meta_description: Explore the 2025 Best Christian Colleges in Arizona ranking. Compare top Christian colleges and universities in your state.
data.text:
Grand Canyon University

Blue checkmark.

4 Year ,

PHOENIX, AZ ,

10474 Niche users give it an average review of 4.2 stars.

Featured Review: Freshman says Attending Grand Canyon University has been an incredible experience! From the moment I stepped onto campus, I felt welcomed and supported. The professors are passionate and always willing to help,... .

Read 10474 reviews.

Overall Niche Grade : B ,

Acceptance Rate : 81% ,

Net Price : $21,939 ,

Arizona Christian University

Blue checkmark.

4 Year ,

GLENDALE, AZ ,

314 Niche users give it an average review of 3.7 stars.

Featured Review: Junior says My experience at Arizona Christian University has been an amazing experience. I have been able to express myself a lot through the activities that they have for new students to go to and just be able... .

Overall Niche Grade : C ,

Acceptance Rate : 70% ,

Net Price : $28,755 ,

SAT Range : 960-1170 ,

Ottawa University - Surprise

4 Year ,

SURPRISE, AZ ,

30 Niche users give it an average review of 4.1 stars.

Featured Review: Junior says Staff and administration is incredibly helpful! The campus is beautiful and with most of the student population being athletes, there is immense diversity. .

Acceptance Rate : 29% ,

Net Price : $35,402 ,

SAT Range : 980-1230 ,

Ottawa University - Phoenix

4 Year ,

PHOENIX, AZ ,

57 Niche users give it an average review of 4 stars.

Featured Review: Alum says The advisors and professors were very patient, understanding and willing to go above and beyond for their students success. During my undergraduate experience, a major loss took place that shook my... .

Nelson American Indian College

Blue checkmark.

4 Year ,

PHOENIX, AZ ,

66 Niche users give it an average review of 4.2 stars.

Featured Review: Freshman says As a student athlete at SAGU American Indian College, I have really enjoyed my experience. The culture at the college is great being a Christian college; everyone is very kind and welcoming. .

Net Price : $17,627 ,

International Baptist College & Seminary

4 Year ,

CHANDLER, AZ ,

3 Niche users give it an average review of 4.7 stars.

Featured Review: Senior says They give quality education that ultimately points their students to Christ. The mentoring aspect of IBCS gives the students the opportunity to interact with their teachers on a more personal level. .

Net Price : $18,169 ,

Indian Bible College

Blue checkmark.

4 Year ,

FLAGSTAFF, AZ ,

2 Niche users give it an average review of 5 stars.

Featured Review: Sophomore says The greatest thing about Indian Bible College (IBC) is the community. It is a small college of about 30 to 40 students including online and remote students. I know the name of every on-campus... The one thing I would like to see changed is at least one lab science class. Even though science is not often a requirement for Bible Students, it would help those of us looking to further our... .

Acceptance Rate : 100% ,

Net Price : $5,045 ,

Grand Canyon University - Online

Blue checkmark.

4 Year (Online) ,

PHOENIX, AZ ,

240 Niche users give it an average review of 4.6 stars.

Featured Review: Graduate Student says GCU has been an amazing school for me especially online. The assistance provided with everythign has been top tier. This is my second degree with them and all fo my professors have been a blessing.... .
